definitions.definition: A sideways shuffling or sliding motion.
To walk fast; to go quickly; to run away hastily.
definitions.example: They scooted over to the window.

definitions.definition: (of an animal) To move with the forelegs while sitting, so that the floor rubs against its rear end.
definitions.example: The dog was scooting all over our new carpet.

definitions.definition: To move sideways (especially along a seat for multiple people), usually to make room for someone else (to sit, stand, etc.).
definitions.example: Do you mind scooting a bit to the left?

definitions.definition: To dispatch someone or something at speed.
A sudden flow of water; a squirt.
